com.aurel.track.admin.server.siteConfig.incomingEmail

Class IncomingEmailBL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.admin.server.siteConfig.incomingEmail.IncomingEmailBL

  • public class IncomingEmailBL
extends java.lang.Object
    It manages handling of the server configuration for incoming e-mail connections.

    • Method Detail

      • getIncomingEmailTO

        public static IncomingEmailTO getIncomingEmailTO(TSiteBean siteBean)

      • getIncomingEmailTO

        public static IncomingEmailTO getIncomingEmailTO(TSiteBean siteBean,
                                 java.util.Locale locale)
        This method returns a transfer object for the incoming e-mail configuration (POP3 or IMAP). The transfer object can be used to move data between the application layer and the user interface.
        Parameters:
        siteBean - contains all data for the server configuration
        locale - the locale used for translating the radio group texts.
        Returns:
        the transfer object for the incoming e-mail configuration

      • updateIncomingEmail

        public static void updateIncomingEmail(TSiteBean siteBean,
                       IncomingEmailTO incomingEmailTO)
        Updates the site bean (server configuration bean) with new information from the incoming e-mail configuration transfer object.
        Parameters:
        siteBean - contains all data for the server configuration
        incomingEmailTO - transfer object with POP3 or IMAP server configuration data

      • validateIncomingEmail

        public static java.util.List<ControlError> validateIncomingEmail(IncomingEmailTO incomingEmailTO,
                                                 TSiteBean siteBean,
                                                 java.util.List<ControlError> errors,
                                                 java.util.Locale locale)
